scripts.build:cjs: BABEL_ENV=build babel src -d build/cjs/src --root-mode upward && BABEL_ENV=build babel ui -d build/cjs/ui --root-mode upward
scripts.build:es: BABEL_ENV=es babel src -d build/es/src --root-mode upward && BABEL_ENV=es babel ui -d build/es/ui --root-mode upward
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build:test && mocha 'build/tests/**/*.js' -r jsdom-global/register
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
